hero.name: Célia Haro
hero.location: Based between Nantes and Angers – Available to collaborate on your web projects

about.title: About
about.text1: The web and computer science have always sparked my curiosity. In March 2024, I decided to turn interest into action by joining the Web Integrator program at OpenClassrooms.
about.text2: This journey takes place as a work-study at Keldin, which allows me to combine theoretical learning with hands-on practice: creating interfaces, optimizing user experiences, understanding client needs, and developing tailored solutions.
about.text3: Every new project is an opportunity to learn, experiment, and push my limits. Curious and detail-oriented, I put my energy and attention to detail into delivering web solutions that are both effective and engaging.

booki.title: Booki
booki.description: Responsive integration of a travel agency website from a Figma mockup.

ohmyfood.title: Ohmyfood
ohmyfood.description: Mobile interface enhancement for a restaurant website with CSS animations.

portfolio_sophie_bluel.title: Portfolio Sophie Bluel
portfolio_sophie_bluel.description: Creation of a dynamic web page and content management via API.

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.description: Real estate rental web application, front-end features development.

nina_carducci.title: Nina Carducci
nina_carducci.description: SEO and accessibility optimization of a photographer's website.

argent_bank.title: Argent Bank
argent_bank.description: Front-end implementation of a banking application and state management with Redux.

client_keldin.title: Enterprise website (confidential client)
client_keldin.description: Responsive adaptation, feature additions and bug fixes on a complex codebase. Developed strong debugging skills and direct client collaboration, providing concrete insight into job requirements.

scraping_keldin.title: Data scraping projects
scraping_keldin.description: Automated extraction and processing of data from multiple websites, with JSON and CSV export to facilitate analysis and information exploitation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.accroche: You have a project in mind ? Let's bring it to reality together
